title: Cane River Creole National Historical Park: Traveling Trunks
body: Traveling Trunks         Results   Showing results 1-2 of 2    Sort By:  Title Date         Cane River Creole National Historical Park Civil War Traveling Trunk    Want to learn more about the Civil War in Louisiana? Reserve our Civil War Traveling Trunk for your students!    Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Seventh Grade-Twelfth Grade Subjects:Civil Rights Movement, Civil War, Family Life, History, Military and Wartime History        Cane River Creole National Historical Park Creole Culture Traveling Trunk    This trunk contains a variety of activities that will help your students learn about the Cane River Creoles. Today, as in the past, Creole transcends racial boundaries. It connects people to their colonial roots, be they descendants of European settlers, enslaved Africans, or those of mixed heritage, which may include African, French, Spanish, and American Indian influences.    Type:Traveling Trunk Grade level:Seventh Grade-Twelfth Grade Subjects:African American History and Culture, History, Slavery, Social Studies
